Text.Page:
The argons are reinforcing as fast as we can kill them. I need you to take the fight to them.

Head out and kill hulrap bashers, vulnaq threshers, zariik dazzlers and cyclopses, iknephar prelates, kalash sentinels, and syndrene dragoons wherever you find them.

Report to Sistiren at Khanovar Citadel when your mission is complete.
Fine work, <PCNAME>. Hopefully, that gives our forces time to forge ahead.
It doesn't look like you've completed your objectives.
